responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "320103664BCE8334F800DCA7615BB33C", "Ha! Thraen trusts in process and established lore. \'Corruption\' is too close to old wives\' tales for his liking, not tangible enough for his strategies unless it bites him on the arse. He needs irrefutable proof, and even then, he\'ll form a committee. We might not have that kind of time. You\'re our eyes and ears in places even my scouts can\'t reach quickly. Just... keep your options open, and your wits about you.")
name: ANV_FTUE_Dunir_BrimirColdchisel_6_Response
